graphql.query:
query getCheckoutFormList($locale: String = "en") {
  checkoutFormList(
    _locale: $locale
    filter: {_path: {_expressions: {_operator: STARTS_WITH, value: "/content/dam/ardx/colibri"}}}
  ) {
    items {
      ci_header
      ci_first_name
      ci_last_name
      ci_email_label
      ci_email_message
      ci_email_error
      ci_phone_label
      ci_phone_error
      ci_consent
      ci_edit
      ship_header
      ship_address1
      ship_address2
      ship_city
      ship_state
      ship_zip
      ship_options
      ship_option1_label
      ship_option1_desc
      ship_option2_label
      ship_option2_desc
      ship_option3_label
      ship_option3_desc
      ship_updating
      ship_update_success
      ship_update_close
      ship_edit
      tax_update_success
      ship_state_error
      bill_header
      bill_card_name
      bill_card_text
      bill_date_text
      bill_security_code_text
      bill_address_same
      bill_address1
      bill_address2
      bill_city
      bill_state
      bill_zip
      bill_processing
    }
  }
}

query getType($locale: String = "en") {
  typeList(
    _locale: $locale
    filter: {_path: {_expressions: {_operator: STARTS_WITH, value: "/content/dam/ardx/colibri"}}}
  ) {
    items {
      align
      h2_header
      h3_header
      h4_header
      h5_header
      h6a_superscript
      body1
      body1_light
      body2
      body2_light
      button_stretch
      button1_label
      button1_url
      button1_color
      button1_newtab
      button2_label
      button2_url
      button2_color
      button2_newtab
      link_label
      link_url
      link_newtab
    }
  }
}
